quoteLast: H.M.S. _Orama_ was torpedoed in convoy. _Conyngham_ went full speed, circled bow of _Orama_, saw submarine between lines of convoy, passed right over it so that it was plainly visible and dropped depth charge. Prompt and correct action of Commander Johnson saved more ships from being torpedoed and probably destroyed the submarine.
